step.name: Update TimeGroup
step.sql: UPDATE dim_time SET time_group = CASE when time_hour < 6 then 'Night' when time_hour < 12 then 'Morning' when time_hour < 14 then 'LunchTime' when time_hour < 18 then 'Afternoon' when time_hour < 22 then 'Evening' when time_hour < 25 then 'Late Night' ELSE 'Unknown' END

info.name: Meter Reading ETL
info.description: Loads meter readings from the VPower MeterTrendHistory collection

notepad.note: Need to add ability to limit extract to new data only.

step.name: Get Max Date
step.sql: SELECT MAX(meter_event_date_fk) AS max_date FROM dev.fct_meter_event

step.name: Get Max Time
step.sql: SELECT MAX(meter_event_time_fk) AS max_time FROM dev.fct_meter_event WHERE meter_event_date_fk = max_date

jsScript.jsScript_script: var resObj = JSON.parse(result); var hasTrendData = resObj.trendData.length > 0;

info.name: tr_rest_vpower_authenticate

hop.from: Select Site Event TS Date Max
hop.to: Select Site Event TS Time Max

hop.from: Select Site Event TS Time Max

step.name: Select Site Event TS Date Max
step.sql: SELECT m.utc_date_max as date_max,m.site_key as meter_event_site_fk FROM ( SELECT max(meter_event_utc_date_fk) as utc_date_max,meter_event_site_fk as site_key FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event GROUP BY meter_event_site_fk) m INNER JOIN (select max(meter_event_utc_date_fk) as utc_date_max,meter_event_site_fk as site_key from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event group by meter_event_site_fk) m1 ON m1.site_key = m.site_key;

step.name: Select Site Event TS Time Max
step.sql: SELECT m.utc_date_max,m1.utc_time_max,m.site_key FROM ( SELECT max(meter_event_utc_date_fk) as utc_date_max,meter_event_site_fk as site_key FROM ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event GROUP BY meter_event_site_fk) m INNER JOIN (select max(meter_event_utc_time_fk) as utc_time_max,meter_event_site_fk as site_key from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.fct_meter_event where meter_event_utc_date_fk = ? and meter_event_site_fk = ? group by meter_event_site_fk) m1 ON m1.site_key = m.site_key;
step.lookup: Select Site Event TS Date Max

step.name: Select Site BK & Title
step.sql: SELECT DISTINCT site_key, site_bk, site_title from ${VE_BIWAREHOUSE_DB_SCHEMA}.dim_site

step.name: Select Site Event TS Max
Table input
step.sql: SELECT MAX(meter_event_date_fk) AS max_date , MAX(meter_event_time_fk) AS max_time FROM dev.fct_meter_event

step.name: Select Load TS Stats
step.sql: select y.site_title as SiteName, y.site_bk as SiteBK, meter_event_site_fk as SiteTK, meter_event_lc_date_fk as LocalDateMax, meter_event_lc_time_fk as LocalTimeMax, y.cfm_time_zone as TimeZone from ( select meter_event_site_fk, meter_event_lc_date_fk, meter_event_lc_time_fk , row_number() over (partition by meter_event_site_fk order by meter_event_lc_date_fk desc, meter_event_lc_time_fk desc) as rn from fct_meter_event ) as x inner join dim_site as y on y.site_key = x.meter_event_site_fk where rn = 1

step.name: Select Load TS Stats
Select Load TS Stats
step.sql: select y.site_title as SiteName, y.site_bk as SiteBK, meter_event_site_fk as SiteTK, meter_event_lc_date_fk as LocalDateMax, meter_event_lc_time_fk as LocalTimeMax, y.cfm_time_zone as TimeZone from ( select meter_event_site_fk, meter_event_lc_date_fk, meter_event_lc_time_fk , row_number() over (partition by meter_event_site_fk order by meter_event_lc_date_fk desc, meter_event_lc_time_fk desc) as rn from fct_meter_event ) as x inner join dim_site as y on y.site_key = x.meter_event_site_fk where rn = 1

step.name: Select Load TS Stats

notepad.note: 1. Get global variable for default cutoff time (starting time for meter data query) 2. Parse that string into a Date object 3. In "Stream Lookup" step, select max time for this Site/default meter. If there is a record then use its "time_fk", otherwise use the default cutoff time.
